segments.text: Excuse me Miao Li . Could you tell me who Jackie Chan is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . Jackie Chan is a very famous movie star in Hong Kong . His Chinese name is Cheng Long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ha , I know Cheng Long a lot , he has made 40 films since 1976 . And at that time he was promoted as the new Bruce Lee . But I'm not familiar with his English name .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Then tell me what else you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some movie stars measure their worth by how many millions of dollars they make . Do you know how Jackie Chan measures his worth ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He measures his worth by how many of his bones he has fractured while executing his film , incredible stunts . By the way , can you count the breaks ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . His skull , his eyes , his nose , three times , his jaw , his shoul-der , is chest , two fingers , a knee . As he said ' Everything from the top of my head to the bottom of my feet ! '
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Indeed you know much about him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is because he is the action-movie incarnate or action-star extraordinaire around the world .
segments.speaker: S1
